utilities

Class Collider

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Collider

  • public class Collider
extends java.lang.Object
    A system for processing collision between IColliders.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk Created on 4/20/2015.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.function.Consumer<Location2D> addOilSlick
      The function used to add an oil slick to the game in the event one is created from a collision.
      private static java.util.function.BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider> birdAgainstCar
      The function which handles a collision between a bird and a car.
      private static java.util.function.BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider> carAgainstBird
      The function which handles a collision between a car and a bird.
      private static java.util.function.BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider> carAgainstCar
      The function which handles a collision of two cars.
      private static java.util.function.BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider> carAgainstFuelCan
      The function which handles a collision between a car and fuel can.
      private static java.util.function.BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider> carAgainstOilSlick
      The function which handles a collision between a car and an oils slick.
      private static java.util.function.BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider> carAgainstPylon
      The function that handles a collision between a car and a pylon.
      private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.function.BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider>> funcs
      A map of the response functions for the collisions.

      static void addSlickHandler(java.util.function.Consumer<Location2D> consumer)
      Constructs the collider with a special function for oil slick additions.
      static void collide(ICollider a, ICollider b)
      Carries out the response for the given collision determined by the collision key created from the concatenation of their collision keys.

        public static void addSlickHandler(java.util.function.Consumer<Location2D> consumer)

      • collide

        public static void collide(ICollider a,
                           ICollider b)
        Carries out the response for the given collision determined by the collision key created from the concatenation of their collision keys.
        Parameters:
        a - The first collider.
        b - The second collider.
